title: Plate
description: plate, blue on white porcelain; in the center one figure is seen descending the steps of a pagoda, and another figure and servant on the veranda; four medallions containing emblems of poets, music, etc., on rim, with quatrefoil diaper; this plate has the Ch\'eng Hua mark of the Ming dynasty, indicating that it is made in K\'and Hsi period proper
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Eugene J. Carpenter and Olivia Carpenter Coan in memory of Eugene J. Carpenter
